Â Â Â Â Â perhaps she enjoys some things that you think are bad

Â Â Â Â Â  war and peace 2: more war

7.3.18  12:56 am   Please name a gemstone

Â Â Â Â Â i would prefer to make one instead

7.3.18  12:52 am   any plans to bring back "i disagree but i respect your opinion"? gotta tell you. wham. what a statement. it's done wonders for me

Â Â Â Â Â i had to stop using because someone said it to me and i realized how powerful it is. it's too powerful

7.3.18  12:51 am   you ever record audio journals talking about audio journals

Â Â Â Â Â  of course

7.3.18  12:50 am   Do you ever write something so good that you question it's (relative) originality? 

Â Â Â Â Â  sure. and even if i know it's original, i can still look forward to being sued on behalf of marvin gaye, if the song becomes popular

7.3.18  12:25 am   https://youtu.be/DofhF-2sg1o why's it called time mop

Â Â Â Â Â that's the name of the music the video is based on. it's similar to a time bomb, which is simply going to explode at the end of 8 bars. but instead it's a mop, for 2 reasons, because it's fun to pronounce "bomb" wrong, and also you could think of it like a mop, mopping up the time

7.2.18  9:36 pm   i am going to be traveling soon, and i would like to be able to write music while away, but i will not have consistent access to power (so phone is no guarantee... even then i hate using shitty phone apps). i'm capable of writing melodies down well enough that i can understand them later, but not good enough to write/transcribe with no instrument handy. my options seem to be buying a mini keyboard (tough to find one that doesn't require external power and doesn't suck), buying a small percussion instrument (probably a kalimba, though i've never played it before), or going without and probably doing less cool kinds of writing. do you have any solutions / advice

Â Â Â Â Â you're going to have to do it all in your head, and write it down on paper. i've written many of my songs that way. it's fun

7.2.18  9:19 pm   help there is a plate what do i do

Â Â Â Â Â  sounds like you've got a reality show on your hands

7.2.18  8:53 pm   what is the time signature of "i wanna be a movie star"? there seem to be 9 beats between lines, but it doesn't really feel like 3 measures of 3/4

Â Â Â Â Â  i was hearing it 4/4 + 5/4. some people think i'm crazy for that, and they do hear it as all 3s. i am with you in not hearing it like that. but we're only talking about the chorus, and some of the verse. there are exceptions in the verse and bridge

7.2.18  8:19 pm   Have you ever thought of making physical copies of your music (CD, vinyl, tape)?

Â Â Â Â Â that doesn't seem very useful this day and age.......

Â Â Â Â Â seems like a good idea
